Isabella Rodriguez.description: working at the counter serving customers and preparing for the Potluck (taking customer orders) (serving food and drinks to customers) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about how Maria and Klaus plan to continue their discussion on gentrification and research collaboration at the library, brainstorming ideas for solutions and incorporating sources into their collaboration @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, I saw you over there and wanted to continue our discussion on gentrification and research collaboration. Do you have some time to talk more?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, I would love to continue our discussion. How about we head back to the library and dive deeper into our research collaboration?
Maria Lopez
Sure, let's head to the library now. I have some ideas I want to discuss with you.
Klaus Mueller
Sounds great, let's grab our stuff and head to the library.
Maria Lopez
Let's grab our notebooks and pens before we head to the library.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you for initiating this collaboration, Maria. I'm excited to hear your ideas and work together towards finding solutions.
Maria Lopez
Let me quickly finish up my meal and then we can head to the library together.
Klaus Mueller
Take your time finishing up, Maria. We can discuss more once you're ready.
Maria Lopez
I'm all set, let's head to the library now.
Klaus Mueller
Shall we continue our discussion on potential solutions for challenges faced by low-income communities once we reach the library?
Maria Lopez
Let's definitely continue our discussion on potential solutions for challenges faced by low-income communities once we reach the library.
Klaus Mueller
Shall we also brainstorm some innovative ideas for our research collaboration?
Maria Lopez
That sounds like a great plan, Klaus. I'm excited to brainstorm innovative ideas together.
Klaus Mueller
Shall we start by reviewing the sources we have on gentrification to see how we can incorporate them into our research collaboration?
Maria Lopez
Let's definitely start by reviewing the sources we have on gentrification to see how we can incorporate them into our research collaboration.
Klaus Mueller
Let's make sure to document all our ideas and discussions in our notebooks for reference as we work on our research collaboration.
